headline: NRG Energy, Inc. (NRG) Could Go Up In H2 2025, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Recently Discussed These 11 Stocks & Said The Robots Are Coming. NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed.
